Class Edge2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.DrawObject
      • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.Edge2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Edge

    public class Edge2D
extends DrawObject
implements Edge
    CS 4500/5500 Advanced OO Design and GUI Techniques.
    This class is written as part of the course cs4500/5500 under guidance and instruction of Dr. Dusan Sormaz.
    This class defines the draw object for arcs.
    Author:
    Arif
